com.ecomDomain.reuseMethods

Class Search_Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ecomDomain.reuseMethods.Search_Util

  • public class Search_Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Re-Usable methods of Search Functionality for Retail Sites Also created re-usable methods for DemandWare business flows Some of the DW methods can be optimized and use for other platform based retail site also
    Author:
    harish.subramani

        Searches keyword in Retail Search Box
        Parameters:
        txtSrch - : WebElement for Search Box
        btnSrch - : WebElement for Search Button
        txtToSearch - : Keyword to search
        driver - : WebDriver instance

      • selectFromSearchProductResult

        public static final void selectFromSearchProductResult(java.lang.String srchRsltLoc,
                                                       java.lang.String whichRsltToClick,
                                                       org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
        Select the search product from result - DW and Non-DW application can use this
        Parameters:
        srchRsltLoc - : String format - ul[class=''] li:nth-child($) a
        whichRsltToClick - : $ symbol in srchRsltLoc param will be replaced with this string. Ex: "1" - ul[class=''] li:nth-child(1) a
        driver - : WebDriver Instance

      • selectFromSearchProductSuggestion

        public static final void selectFromSearchProductSuggestion(java.lang.String srchSuggstnRslt,
                                                           java.lang.String whichSuggstnToClick,
                                                           org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
        Select the search suggestion from result - DW application can use this
        Parameters:
        srchSuggstnRslt - : String format - ul[class=''] li:nth-child($) a
        whichSuggstnToClick - : $ symbol in srchRsltLoc param will be replaced with this string. Ex: "1" - ul[class=''] li:nth-child(1) a
        driver - : WebDriver Instance
